__e: People say he is in consort with the devil.
But the fact is you're looking at a guy... who made a deal with the Devil that only God can get me out of.
I've made a pact with the Lord of the Night, my soul in exchange for yours
I've made a pact with the Lord of the Night, my soul in exchange for yours
Many years ago... my mother made a pact with death.
But the fact is you're looking at a guy... who made a deal with the Devil that only God can get me out of.
'When we have dealt with love, how can we be scared?
What of the covenant of honor between a father and his son?
Your father told me about your pact.
He said you had made a pact, and that you didn't stick to it.
He who made a pact with Him, belongs to Him.
Sign our agreement. and I'll be your obedient servant.

Not according to the covenant that I made with their fathers in the day when I took them by the hand to lead them out of the land of Egypt; because they continued not in my covenant, and I regarded them not, saith the Lord.
There and then before the gods, you made a pact only death could break.
Carmen won't come and you might have known it.
We promised each other that we wouldn't let the other one end up like my brother.
I'll go to it and tell them all I know about Mr Dowsett's drowning and the bargain made to keep the family out of the village. What they did to the boy.
You're plotting with him to kill the young.
For more information on the UN Global Compact, please visit www.unglobalcompact.org.

As a proud member of the UN Global Compact (UNGC), we are committed to contribute to the Global Goals and to promoting the Ten Principles regarding Human Rights, Labour, Environment and Anti-corruption.
The UN Global Compact brings business, organisations, UN agencies, world of work and civil society around ten universally accepted principles for building a more stable and inclusive societies.

Since 2004, the Bosch Group has belonged to the United Nations Global Compact. We support the ten principles of the Global Compact and, in compliance with the Bosch values, use the international network in order to set higher standards in human and workers’ rights, as well as in environmental protection and the fight against corruption.
